name: Bellum Mechanica
desc: Design an engine capable of automating robo-warfare, then direct your bots to victory against other player-written AI. Inspired by chess, autochess & Battlesnakes

name: An Imperial Simulation
desc: An empire simulator that takes inspiration from Orteil's Neverending Legacy. Build and nurture a settlement in a hostile world.

name: AloeCMS
desc: A lightweight, detail-oriented and semi-modular CMS, built as a custom backend for Swimhistory.co.za

name: Mnemonist
desc: An opinionated tool for memorising language vocabulary (or any other set of information), that encourages users to treat their knowledge like a database.

name: Realmforge
desc: A collaborative worldbuilding platform combined with online roleplaying and idle game mechanics.

name: SpawnerJS
desc: Another framework for building Javascript UIs in a functional style. Originally written because I didn't want to learn PHP or jQuery.
